testcase.name: TC01_manager_should_create_hotel_reservation
testcase.system-out: Given user is on the application_login page.................................passed And user enters manager_id "manager"........................................passed And user enters manager_password "Manager1!"................................passed And clicks on login button..................................................passed And verify login "manager" is displayed.....................................passed And user navigates to create_room_reservation_page..........................passed And user enters the IDUser..................................................passed And user enters the IDHotel.................................................passed And user enters the price...................................................passed And user enters the date_start..............................................passed And user enters the date_end................................................passed And user enters the adult_amount............................................passed And user enters the children_amount.........................................passed And user enters the contact_name............................................passed And user enters the contact_phone...........................................passed And user enters the contact_email...........................................passed And user enters the notes...................................................passed And user clicks on the approved checkbox....................................passed And user clicks on the is_paid checkbox.....................................passed And user clicks on the save_button..........................................passed Then user verifies the success_message......................................passed
